title: Top Coffee-Producing Countries and Their Global Share
subtitle: List of the leading coffee-producing nations, their major growing regions, and their percentage contribution to global coffee production.

data.major_regions: Minas Gerais, Espírito Santo, São Paulo, Bahia, Paraná
